Text: So on other words it actually has nothing whatsoever to do with Portishead, So why post it as Portishead?????
BECOUSE DISC LOOK LIKE PORTISHEAD-SEE IMAGES, VOCAL NEARLY BETH GIBBONS, BUT BELONG Nicola Hitchcock, MAYBY IT IS JOKE . DESCRIPTION I DOWNLOAD FROM NET.SORRY  BY MY BAD ENGLISH
This was probably a cheap move by Mandalay to gain fans. Why do you perpetuate this deceitful garbage? And no, it doesn't sound like Portishead.

This has nothing to do with Mandalay, it's not uncommon that people rename and sell bootlegs like this. I've seen similair releases with Boards of Canada, where the artist was a band called Cim, and also the fake Prodigy album Castbreeder. :)
